channel.title: CVE Feed for Beckhoff -- TwinCAT 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Beckhoff -- TwinCAT 2

item.title: CVE-2019-5637|2024-09-17T01:35:41.695Z -- beckhoff -- twincat%202
item.description: When Beckhoff TwinCAT is configured to use the Profinet driver, a denial of service of the controller could be reached by sending a malformed UDP packet to the device. This issue affects TwinCAT 2 version 2304 (and prior) and TwinCAT 3.1 version 4204.0 (and prior).

item.title: CVE-2019-5636|2024-09-17T03:18:42.935Z -- beckhoff -- twincat%202
item.description: When a Beckhoff TwinCAT Runtime receives a malformed UDP packet, the ADS Discovery Service shuts down. Note that the TwinCAT devices are still performing as normal. This issue affects TwinCAT 2 version 2304 (and prior) and TwinCAT 3.1 version 4204.0 (and prior).
